g++   -g -DCHECK_PTHREAD_RETURN_VALUE -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Wextra -Wconversion -Wno-unused-parameter -Wold-style-cast -Woverloaded-virtual -Wpointer-arith -Wshadow -Wwrite-strings -march=native -std=c++0x -rdynamic -O0    CMakeFiles/logging_test.dir/logging_test.cc.o  -o ../../../bin/logging_test -rdynamic ../../../lib/libbingchen_base.a -lpthread -lrt
